alert.note: Alert for Mills; Montgomery; Page; Pottawattamie (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 14 at 9:51PM CDT until April 14 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: The National Weather Service in Omaha has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Montgomery County in southwestern Iowa... Northeastern Mills County in southwestern Iowa... Southeastern Pottawattamie County in southwestern Iowa... Northwestern Page County in southwestern Iowa... * Until 1045 PM CDT. * At 951 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 2 miles south of Silver City to 4 miles northeast of Randolph to 3 miles southwest of Shenandoah, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Emergency management. These storms have a history of producing strong enough winds to overturn a semi. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Emerson around 1000 PM CDT. Essex and Henderson around 1005 PM CDT. Carson and Macedonia around 1010 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Red Oak, Stanton, Elliott, Villisca and Grant. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
